verses.text: Ha winhaj Absalón yuninal winhaj rey Dawid, ay jun ix yanab' winh scuch Tamar, te wach' yilji ix. Axo ix aji, a winhaj Amnón yuninal pax winhaj rey Dawid chi', ix te kan sgana winh t'a ix Tamar schab'il yanab', yuj chi' ix te chucb'i sk'ol winh yuj snaub'tanhan ix. Te ayoch yilumal ix yujto cob'esto ix, yuj chi' ix sna winhaj Amnón chi' to ajaltac sk'uman ix winh.
Palta ay jun winh yamigo winh scuchan Jonadab, yuninal winhaj Simea yuk'tac winhaj Dawid chi', te jelan winh t'a chukal.

Ay jun k'u ix sk'anb'ej winh t'a winhaj Amnón chi': --Ach yuninal rey, ¿tas tzach ik'ani? ¿Tas yuj junjun k'u tzach te tz'onb'i yuj cusk'olal? Al t'ayin tas tzach ik'ani, xchi winh. Ix tak'wi winhaj Amnón chi': --Ste kan wal in gana t'a ix Tamar, yanab' winh schab'il wuk'tac aj Absalón, xchi winh.

Axo ix yalan winhaj Jonadab chi' t'a winh icha tik: --Ha ticnaik, ek'anh jichan t'a a ch'at, tza tz'acan penaayax a b'a. Ayic ol jawok winh a mam ach yila', tzal t'a winh icha tik: Tzin tewi t'ayach to tza checcot ix Tamar ix wanab', yic syak' jab'oc in wael ix, aocab' ix sb'oani, yic wach' ol wila'', ol in waani, ol in chaan t'a ix, xa chi t'a winh, xchi winh.

Ix ek' jichan winhaj Amnón chi' t'a sch'at, ix stz'acan penaayax sb'a winh. Ayic ix k'och winh rey chi' yil winh, ix yal winh icha tik: --Tzin tewi t'ayach to scot ix wanab' Tamar t'a tik, sb'oan chab'oc in pan ix, tzul yak'ancan ix t'ayin, xchi winh t'a winh rey chi'.
Yuj chi' ix checjib'at ix yuj winhaj rey Dawid chi', ix yalan winh t'a ix: --Ixic t'a spat winhaj Amnón a nulej, b'at a b'oan jab'oc tas swa winh, xchi winh.
Yuj chi' ix b'at ix Tamar t'a spat winh snulej chi', haxo ix k'och ix, jichan ek' winh. Q'uelanoch winh t'a ix, ix sb'oan ixim pan chi' ix.

Ix yak'an k'anb'oc ixim ix t'a yol xalten, ix yik'anelta ix t'a yol xalten chi', palta haxo winhaj Amnón chi' maj yal-laj sk'ol winh ix wa'i, ix yalan winh: Elanhec t'a tik he masanil, xchi winh. Ix elta heb', manhxalaj junok mach ix cani.

Ayic toxo ix elta heb' chi' smasanil t'a patic pat chi', ix yalan winh t'a ix Tamar chi' icha tik: --Ik'cot in wael chi' b'aj tzin way tik, xchi winh t'a ix. Ix yik'anb'at ixim pan chi' ix t'a winh snulej chi' t'a sch'at.
Axo yic ix k'och ix t'a stz'ey winh yet' swael chi', ix och lak'naj winh t'a ix, ix yalan winh: --Cotanh ach wanab', wayanh wed'oc, xchi winh t'a ix.
Ix tak'wi ix t'a winh: --Maay ach in nulej, manh in ak' pural, yujto a jun tik manh smojoc yuji t'a ko kal a onh israel onh tik, te q'uixwelal ol aj jun tik.

Nato nab'i ¿tas ol in k'ulej yuj jun in q'uixwelal tik? Anhejtona' a ach tik icha junok quistal ol ach ajkan t'a skal ko chonhab' tik. Ha ticnaik, swal t'ayach to tzal t'a winh rey, a winh ol in ak'an t'ayach etb'eyumoc, xchi ix.
Palta majxo schalaj yab' winh tas ix yal ix chi'. Yujto te ay yip winh t'a yichanh ix, yuj chi' ix yak'an pural ix winh yixtani.

Ayic ix lajwi yixtan ix winh, te chuclaj ix aj yilanoch ix winh, t'a yichanh ix aj skan sgana winh t'a ix t'a sb'ab'elal, yuj chi' ix yal winh t'a ix icha tik: --Q'ueanh waan, elanh t'a tik t'a elanhchamel, xchi winh t'a ix.
Palta ix tak'wi ix: --Maay ach in nulej, tato tzin a pechel t'a tik ticnaik, yelxo te chuk t'a yichanh tas ix in utej tik, xchi ix. Palta majxo schalaj yab' winh.
Axo ix aji, ix yavtancot winh schecab' winh, ix yalan winh: --Pechel jun ix ix tik t'a tik, wach' tzutej a macan te' pat chi', xchi winh.
Yuj chi' ix pechjielta ix yuj winh schecab' winh chi', wach' ix yutej winh smacan sti' te' pat chi'. Ha ix Tamar chi', ayoch jun spichul ix te wach' yuj, aton syak'och heb' ix cob'estac yisil rey.
Ix yak'ank'e k'een tik'aq'uil taanh ix t'a sjolom, ix snhik'chitanb'at spichul ix ayoch yuj, ix yak'anoch sk'ab' ix t'a sat, te chaanh ix ok' ix sb'at t'a yoltac b'e.

Ix sk'anb'an winh snulej ix scuchan Absalón t'ay: --¿Tom ach yixtej winh a nulej aj Amnón chi'? Tato icha chi' ach wanab', emanh numan b'ela. Mocab' ach te ok' yuj ilk'olal yuj jun chi', yujto a nulej winh, xchi winh t'a ix. Yuj chi' ix kan ix t'a spat winh snulej chi'. Te cusk'olal ix ajkan ix.
Ayic ix yab'an winhaj rey Dawid masanil tas ix uji chi', ix cot wal yowal winh sik'lab'il.
Axo winhaj Absalón chi', malaj tas ix yal winh t'a winhaj Amnón chi', wach'chom ste chichon sk'ol winh t'a winh yuj b'aj ix ixtaj ix yanab' chi'.

Schab'ilxo ab'il chi', a heb' winh schecab' winhaj Absalón chi', sjoxwi calnel heb' winh t'a Baal-hazor, t'a slak'anil schonhab' heb' aj Efraín. Ix yavtan masanil heb' winh yuninal winh rey chi' winhaj Absalón chi' t'a jun niwan wael.

Ix b'at yalan winh t'a winh rey chi' icha tik: --Mamin rey, a ticnaik a heb' winh in checab' wan sjoxan nok' in calnel heb' winh. Tzin nib'ej, tzach b'at wed'oc yet' masanil heb' etyajalil, xchi winh.

Ix tak'wi winh rey chi' t'a winh icha tik: --Maay ach wuninal, max yal-laj ko b'at ko masanil ed'oc. Tecan niwan tas b'at ko lajeli, xchi winh. Ix och wal tean winhaj Absalón chi' t'a winh, palta maj yal-laj sk'ol winh ix b'ati, anhej wach' lolonel ix yal winh t'a winh.

Ix yalanxi winhaj Absalón chi': --Tato wal yel max yal-laj a b'ati, elokab' t'a a k'ol a chaanb'at winh wuk'tac aj Amnón wed'oc, xchi winh. --¿Tas yuj tza nib'ej sb'at winh uk'tac aj Amnón chi' ed'oc? xchi winhaj rey Dawid chi' t'a winh.
Ix och wal tean winhaj Absalón chi' t'a winh, yuj chi' ix schecb'at winhaj Amnón chi' winh yet' juntzanhxo heb' winh yuk'tac.

Ayic mantzac ochlaj wael chi', ix yalan winhaj Absalón chi' t'a heb' winh schecab': Scham wal eyilani ayic toxo ix k'e anh t'a sjolom winhaj Amnón chi', ol walan t'ayex to tze milcham winh. Manh ex xiwoc, yujto a in swala', yuj chi' tze tek'b'ej he b'a he milancham winh, xchi winh.

Ix sk'anab'ajej heb' winh tas ix yal winh, ix smilcham winhaj Amnón chi' heb' winh. Ayic ix yilan masanil heb' winh yuninal winh rey chi', ix k'e somnaj heb' winh, ix laj k'e heb' winh t'a yib'anh nok' smula, ix b'at heb' winh elelal.
Ayic ayto och heb' winh t'a yol b'e, ix k'och specal t'a winhaj rey Dawid to toxo ix cham masanil heb' yuninal winh yuj winhaj Absalón, manhxo junok heb' winh ixto cani.

Yuj chi' ix k'e jucnaj winh, ix snhik'chitanb'at spichul winh, ix sjulanek' telan sb'a winh t'a sat lu'um yuj cusk'olal. Axo masanil heb' yetyajalil winh ayek' yet'oc, ix snhik'chitejpaxb'at spichul heb'.

Palta a winhaj Jonadab yuninal winhaj Simea, yuk'tac winhaj rey Dawid chi', ix yal winh t'a winh rey chi' icha tik: --Mamin rey, manh a na' icha chi'. Maj chamlaj heb' winh uninal chi' smasanil, anhej winhaj Amnón ix chami, yujto icha chi' ix aj snaan winhaj Absalón t'a spatic winh, yictax ix yixtan ix Tamar winh.
Yuj chi' manh a na' to masanil heb' winh uninal ix chami, palta anhej winhaj Amnón ix chami, xchi winh.

Yacb'an chi' ix b'at winhaj Absalón chi' elelal. Ay jun winh quelem ayk'e t'a yib'anh smuroal chonhab' chi' yic smaclani, ix k'e k'elnaj winh, ix yilan winh to ay juntzanh anima tz'emta t'a pak'an t'a sat witz t'a sb'eal Horonaim, yuj chi' ix yalb'at winh t'a winh rey chi'.
Ix yalan winhaj Jonadab t'a winh rey chi': --Mamin rey, wan sjawi heb' winh uninal icha ix aj walan a in a checab' in tik, xchi winh.
Ato wal slajwi yalan winhaj Jonadab chi' ix k'och heb' winh yuninal winh rey chi'. Ayic ix k'och heb' winh, ix k'e sjaj heb' winh yoq'ui, ix te ok'pax winh rey chi' yet' heb' yetyajalil.

Axo winhaj Absalón chi', ix b'atcan winh elelal. Ha t'a winhaj Talmai yuninal winhaj Amiud sreyal Gesur ix k'ochcan winh. Oxe' ab'il ix kan winh ta'. Axo pax winhaj rey Dawid chi', junjun k'u ix ok' winh yuj schamel winh yuninal.
Ayic toxo ix ek'b'at scusk'olal winh chi' jun, snib'ej winh sb'at yil winhaj Absalón chi'.
